title: One Piece Episode 179 - Collapsing Upper Ruins! The Quintet for the Finale!
author: Toei Animation
description: Official streaming of Episode 179 on Crunchyroll, part of the Sky Island arc. Watch as Enel confronts the final survivors in the ruins of Shandora.

title: ENERU DEFEATS ZORO!! One Piece Episode 179, 180 & 181 REACTION + REVIEW
author: Reactor Channel
description: Reaction and review covering One Piece Episodes 179-181, focusing on Enel's confrontation with the survivors in Shandora and the intense battles that follow.

title: One Piece Episode 179 - Collapsing Upper Ruins! The Quintet for the Finale!
author: Toei Animation
description: Episode 179 streaming on Apple TV. God Eneru begins a deadly rampage aimed at exterminating the heavenly beings of Skypiea, making the ruins of Shandora the scene of a bloody contest where survival is the name of the game.

title: Episode 179 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 179 including plot summary, character appearances, manga chapters covered, trivia, and production details.

title: One Piece Episode 179 on IMDb
author: IMDb
description: IMDb page for Episode 179 with user ratings (8.1/10), cast information, and episode details.
